alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations; North Bighorn Basin; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Bighorn Basin; Southeast Johnson County; Southwest Bighorn Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 06 at 1:18PM MDT until October 07 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. The coldest temperatures will be in Sweetwater County, with other locations expected to be right at or just below freezing. * WHERE...North Bighorn Basin, Southwest Bighorn Basin, Southeast Bighorn Basin, Northeast Johnson County, Southeast Johnson County, Wind River Basin, Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range, Natrona County Lower Elevations and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will be right around freezing for The Bighorn Basin and Wind River Basin tonight into Saturday morning, so some areas may not quite reach freezing. Isolated locations in Sweetwater County may have a Hard Freeze.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
